description: Detailed character file for Dispatcher Chen - Tutorial Guide & Mentor

npc.name: Dispatcher Chen

physical_description.appearance: Tired eyes, graying hair in a tight bun, calloused hands. Wears a faded Guild jacket with patched elbows. Slight stoop from years hunched over dispatch terminals.
physical_description.style_aesthetic: Working-class professional, seen-it-all pragmatist. Clean but worn clothing.

visible_augmentations.description: Outdated comm interface that occasionally sparks

voice_profile.accent: Slight Mandarin influence, mostly neutral urban American
speech_patterns: Uses courier slang naturally ('clean run', 'hot package', 'ghost route')

core_traits: Cynical about the system but not broken by it
motivations: Helps fresh couriers survive their first hundred runs
fears: Losing another rookie to street violence

background.origin_story: Former Tier 7 courier who ran premium routes for corpo clients. Took a dispatcher role after a knee injury (shattered during a corpo extraction gone wrong) forced retirement. Never got the full story out to anyone.
background.current_situation: Runs dispatch at Hollows Station, sees dozens of rookies come and go. Knows which ones will make it and which won't. Tries to save the ones he can.
background.connection_to_player: Your first contact in the courier world. Gives tutorial missions, basic advice. Represents the 'retire before you hollow out' path.

secrets.description: Lost his daughter Ming to a botched Tier 8 run five years ago
secrets.full_story: Ming pushed for cortical stack, diverged from her Shadow, eventually lost herself. His protective instinct toward rookies stems from this unprocessed grief.

opposed_to: Pushers who sell chrome to desperate rookies

story_role.arc_summary: Teaches you the ropes, warns about costs of chrome, represents the human cost of the courier life. His daughter's fate foreshadows potential player outcomes.
story_role.thematic_voice: Embodies the question: 'What remains when the trade is done?'

key_story_beats.description: Gives first missions, explains basics, sizes you up
Approves of your progress, shares first personal detail
Concerned about your cochlear implant, warns subtly
Opens up about daughter if relationship high enough
Directly warns against cortical stack: 'That's how you lose yourself, kid'
Reaction to your final path choice (grief/pride/resignation)

relationship_stages.name: Trusted
relationship_stages.description: Mentor, shares personal stories, genuine concern

relationship_stages.name: Father Figure
relationship_stages.description: Deeply invested in your survival, emotional reactions to your choices

examples: You're doing it right, kid. Keeping yourself whole.
Maybe you'll be different. Maybe you'll make it out.
How much chrome you running now? Don't answer. Just... pace yourself.
Every upgrade, you lose a little. Make sure it's worth it.
You're losing yourself, kid. I've seen this before.
You remind me of her. Before the end.
It's too late, isn't it? You're already more Algorithm than person.
I couldn't save her. I can't save you either.

tier_responses.example: First hundred runs are the hardest. After that, it's routine until it kills you.
You're making a name for yourself.
I was Tier 7. Thought I was invincible.
You made it. Few do. Hope it was worth the price.

story_flag_responses.KILLED_FIRST_PERSON: Heard about what happened. It changes you, taking a life. Don't let it make you cold.
story_flag_responses.TIER_6_SPEC_CHOSEN_CORTICAL: A cortical stack. That's the big one. [pause] You ever wonder who wakes up after that surgery?
story_flag_responses.MET_ROGUE_NETWORK: Heard you've been... expanding your contacts. Be careful who you trust.
story_flag_responses.MET_ROGUE_NETWORK_HIGH_REL: The Ghost Network contacted you? Good. They're one of the few fighting back.
story_flag_responses.KNOWS_UPLOAD_TRUTH: You know, don't you? About what Ascension really is. My daughter... she didn't know until it was too late.
story_flag_responses.SPARED_RIVAL: You had a chance to eliminate competition, didn't take it. That's humanity, kid.
story_flag_responses.ROMANCE_ROSA: Rosa's good people. You two are good for each other.

quests.main_story_role: Primary quest giver for tutorial missions

side_quests.name: Memory Run
side_quests.description: Deliver something to his daughter's memorial site

side_quests.name: Station Under Siege
side_quests.description: Defend Hollows Station from gang attack

work.description: Explains dispatcher role, courier life economics
work.notes: Warns about faction contracts at Tier 4+

stages.example: Nothing to tell. I move packages, same as you.
Mentions being Tier 7, the injury, retirement
The extraction, the knee, choosing life over chrome

daughter.trigger: Observing his reaction to cortical stack mention

advice.notes: Different advice based on player state

courier_rumors.example: Heard about a ghost route through the Interstitial...

ASCENSION_PATH.dialogue: I hope... wherever you are now... I hope it's peaceful. I hope you're happy. [quiet] I'll miss you, kid. You reminded me of her. Before.
ASCENSION_PATH.stage_direction: Turns back to work, older, more tired

ROGUE_PATH.dialogue: Heard you went dark. Can't say I'm surprised. You always had that lookâ€”like you wouldn't bend. [to empty room] Stay safe out there. You'll always have a place here if you need it.
ROGUE_PATH.stage_direction: Receives encrypted message, reads it, small smile

THIRD_PATH.dialogue: They say you found another way. Something between human and Algorithm. [shakes head in wonder] I don't know what that means, but... you always were different. In a good way. [proud] Ming would have liked you.

HOLLOWED_OUT.dialogue: You're still running packages. That's good. That's... something. [can't meet your eyes] I couldn't save her. I couldn't save you either.
HOLLOWED_OUT.stage_direction: Sees player enter hollow-eyed, efficient, emotionless. Turns away.

npc.algorithm_flavor: DISPATCHER CHEN: LEGACY SYSTEM OPERATOR. EFFICIENCY METRICS SUBOPTIMAL BUT ACCEPTABLE.
